alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 4:28AM MST until July 24 at 5:15AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 515 AM MST. * At 427 AM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kearny to 17 miles west of Hayden to 12 miles northwest of Oracle, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kearny, Cactus Forest and Kelvin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
